segments.text: The kitchen looks ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With the sink along the right and cabinets on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her apron is polishing dishes diligently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet runs unchecked, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow water drenches the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms at her feet, yet she ignores it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy climbs the stool toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in mind, hand deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists by reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little theft brings a smile despite the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is beautifully arranged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a joyful contrast to the indoor blunders.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Though the unstable stool worries me a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR
